user.title: Configure the KLF200 Gateway
user.description: Please enter your password, you will find it on the backside of the KLF200

deprecated_yaml.title: The Velux YAML configuration is being removed
deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring Velux using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically.

Remove the Velux YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
